dialogue.introduction: Ayanami-class Destroyer 'Sazanami', Master. You write it like this, but read it as 'Sazanami'
dialogue.library_intro: Special-type destroyer number 19, 9th of the Ayanami-class, Sazanami. It's hard to read? Only you don't know that character, you know. I was with the Nagumo Task Force when Pearl Harbour was burbling, and headed off to bombard Midway. Wasn't that unexpectedly cool?
dialogue.secretary3: Master! If I get carried away, I'll send you flying!♪
dialogue.secretaryidle: Master? Sazanami has has nothing to do... It's okay if you pay attention to her~... Wait, ( #゜Д゜) you're ignoring me!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Master, are you feeling tired nya~? Ah, the ending is no good? Is that so, I see.. memo memo..
dialogue.wedding: Welcome back, Master~! What? Eh, Admiral, your serious face... what? W-what? Eeeeh?
dialogue.show_players_score: What is it, Master? Ah, looking for the report I see... how earnest~♪
dialogue.equipment1: It may be rather nice, thaanks~☆
dialogue.equipment2: Sazanami is a little grateful, just a little.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Ah~ I've really done it this time too... Oh, that's wrong?
dialogue.battle_start: Even Sazanami can sometimes be earnest too, working working♪
dialogue.mvp: Everyone think's I'm just playing around, but well, a bit of effort is amazing, yeah?
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Guh... I've got nothing to say~
dialogue.sunk: Sunk~... in the end at least this... is real...
dialogue.new_year_2015: The new year is here!! ...Ah, but we'll grow a year older this year...
dialogue.valentines_day_2015: Valentine's, YESSS! Right....a chocolate for you too, Master. Here❤
dialogue.early_summer_2015: Ah~ geez! My swimsuit's all messed up! That's totally lame~. Sazanami's gonna take a bath!
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Mid-summer,Mid-summer, here it is! Swimsuits, oh yeah! Whaa? Master should change into swimsuit too!
dialogue.fall_2015: Aah, so it's autumn, huh. Kinda kills my motivation. Master, gimme a shoulder massage, will you?
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Eeh, this year is also about to end. Well, no helping it. Master is also clean, clean.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Setsubun (・∀・) has come! Master, I'll throw beans at you! ⊂( ･∀･) 彡≡・ So ❤ how is it? (๑˃̵ᴗ˂̵) yumyum?
